text: Quick update on where things stand with Welcome Kit Artifacts. The black on black t-shirts are now available for new hires, clients, guests and any Uncorked folks who just want a t-shirt upgrade. For the rest of the artifacts, we are shooting for an Arya debut, where each employee with be welcomed with the artifacts on their desk, like a new employee.

We are still working on finding the right "tag" shirts (side note: apparel is hard). The socks are going into production and we're close to finalizing on new beanies with sewn on tags. The notebooks are almost done being embossed.  And Leah is about complete with employee card decks (note: those will only be reserved for new employees)
Thanks so much for the update!!
we will announce the availability of the black on black t-shirts at all hands next week fyi!
